artist: Painter: After Maarten de Vos; Painter: After Peter Paul Rubens; Draftsman: Antoine Borel; Engraver: Joseph Delongueille
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in sheet margin in black: Peint par Martin De Vos  Desine par Borel  Gravé par Delongueille, Gravé du Roy / LES FLUVES / De la Galerie du Palais Royal /  A.P.D.R. | on sheet in pencil: 2-576
life_date: After Maarten de Vos, Painter, Flemish, c. 1532–1603; After Peter Paul Rubens, Painter, Flemish, 1577–1640; Antoine Borel, Draftsman, French, 1743–1810; Joseph Delongueille, Engraver, French, 1730–1792
title: Les Fleuves
